statements: SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessment WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 7.5 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, policy_number, premium_amount FROM RiskAssessment WHERE premium_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC, assessment_date DESC
SELECT id, customer_name, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND risk_score < 5.0 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, assessment_date DESC
SELECT id, policy_number, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment WHERE assessment_date > '2022-05-15' AND premium_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY risk_score DESC, premium_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment
SELECT policy_id, customer_id FROM InsurancePremiums ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM InsurancePremiums WHERE coverage_type = 'comprehensive'
SELECT MAX(premium_amount) FROM InsurancePremiums
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY policy_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(risk_score) AS average_score FROM RiskAssessment GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT policy_id, customer_id FROM InsurancePremiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000 AND coverage_type = 'comprehensive' ORDER BY policy_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM InsurancePremiums GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_policies > 2 ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT r.policy_id, r.risk_score, i.premium_amount FROM RiskAssessment r JOIN InsurancePremiums i ON r.policy_id = i.policy_id WHERE r.risk_score * i.premium_amount > 5000 ORDER BY r.policy_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment;
SELECT customer_name, risk_level FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessment WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePremiums WHERE coverage_type = 'Life' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM HistoricalData GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment;
SELECT customer_name, risk_level FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePremiums ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessment JOIN HistoricalData ON RiskAssessment.id = HistoricalData.customer_id WHERE HistoricalData.data_value > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM RiskAssessment JOIN InsurancePremiums ON RiskAssessment.id = InsurancePremiums.customer_id WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT id, date, description FROM historical_data;
SELECT * FROM risk_levels ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, coverage_amount FROM data_analysis WHERE risk_level='High';
SELECT description, date FROM historical_data WHERE id=1;
SELECT id, premium_rate FROM insurance_premiums WHERE coverage_amount>50000;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT date, description FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM risk_levels WHERE weight > 50
SELECT premium_rate, coverage_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT id, risk_level FROM data_analysis WHERE premium_rate < 0.05
SELECT * FROM historical_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM policy_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT c.claim_id, c.status, ch.resolution_date FROM claim_history ch JOIN policy_claims c ON ch.claim_id = c.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, risk_level FROM historical_events JOIN risk_assessment ON historical_events.event_id = risk_assessment.event_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount, status FROM policy_claims JOIN claim_history ON policy_claims.claim_id = claim_history.claim_id WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT event_id, event_name, assessment_date, risk_level FROM historical_events JOIN risk_assessment ON historical_events.event_id = risk_assessment.event_id WHERE risk_level = 'High';
